name: The Naughty List (PapaJojo)
description:
Made in a 24 hr challenge, The Naughty List is a terrifying experience - and that's just from the QA perspective!

Made this as my first attempt at a game for fun, and wanted to share the experience.

Merry Christmas everyone, and have a Happy New Year!

P.S. To install on MacOS - make sure to hold control > click on the app > and Press Open while still holding the control button. You'll only have to do this once.

- PJ
